title: Epistemic Circulation: The Architecture of Intelligence Flow
author: Rashid Azarang

description.en: Canonical source document defining the circulatory system of Cognitive Infrastructure — how structured intelligence flows, evolves, and remains coherent across agents, contexts, and time.

sections.title: The Architectonics of Structured Intelligence
sections.content: This constellation of work is coalescing into what I'd call "Intelligence Structuration" – a subdiscipline focused on the deliberate architecture of intelligence across its full lifecycle from creation through retrieval to evolution.

sections.title: What This Cluster Is Becoming
sections.content: The unifying concept isn't merely about managing knowledge but about constructing intelligence infrastructures that recursively improve through use. These papers collectively describe a complete circuit of intelligence flow.

sections.title: The Canonical Source Document
sections.content: This canonical document would serve as the conceptual anchor for this cluster, structured into five interconnected layers: Circulation Principles, Structural Foundations, Transitional Protocols, Flow Dynamics, and Evolutionary Mechanics.

sections.title: Placement in the Genesis Book
sections.content: This cluster should be positioned as a Functional System within the Genesis Book – specifically, as the "Circulatory System" of Cognitive Infrastructure.

sections.title: What's Missing
sections.content: The missing piece in this constellation is a theory of Circulation Diagnostics – a systematic framework for identifying, analyzing, and addressing failures in intelligence flow.

summary: Canonical source document defining the circulatory system of Cognitive Infrastructure — how structured intelligence flows, evolves, and remains coherent across agents, contexts, and time.
